TextEng: "What kind of things do you sell here?"
"I'm trying to save you all! Can't you give me a deal?"
Text: "난 너희 모두를 구하려고 하는데! 좀 깎아줄 수 없어?"

TextEng: "I want to ask you some questions."
"How do I get a weapon upgraded?"
"Do you know anything about the Valsharess?"
"What can you tell me about this camp?"
Text: "이 진영에 대해 뭘 알려줄 수 있어?"

TextEng: "I want to ask you something else."
<StartAction>[Add Attack Bonus +1. Costs <CUSTOM9611> gp. Maximum attack bonus is +10]</Start>
Text: <StartAction>[공격 보너스 +1 추가. 비용 금화 <CUSTOM9611>개. 최대 공격 보너스는 +10]</Start>

TextEng: <StartAction>[Make the weapon regenerate my health (2 hit-points per round). Costs <CUSTOM9716> gp]</Start>
Text: <StartAction>[무기가 내 체력을 재생하도록 만들기 (라운드당 2 HP). 비용 금화 <CUSTOM9716>개]</Start>

TextEng: <StartAction>[Make the weapon give me resistance against magic (+20 SR). Costs <CUSTOM9715> gp]</Start>
Text: <StartAction>[무기가 마법 저항력을 부여하도록 만들기 (+20 SR). 비용 금화 <CUSTOM9715>개]</Start>

TextEng: <StartAction>[Make the weapon grant me True Seeing. Costs <CUSTOM9714> gp]</Start>
Text: <StartAction>[무기가 진실시 능력을 부여하도록 만들기. 비용 금화 <CUSTOM9714>개]</Start>

TextEng: <StartAction>[Make the weapon permanently haste me. Costs <CUSTOM9712> gp]</Start>
Text: <StartAction>[무기가 영구적으로 신속화 효과 부여. 비용 금화 <CUSTOM9712>개]</Start>

TextEng: <StartAction>[Add Enhancement Bonus +1. Costs <CUSTOM9717> gp. Maximum enhancement Bonus is +10]</Start>
Text: <StartAction>[강화 보너스 +1 추가. 비용 금화 <CUSTOM9717>개. 최대 강화 보너스는 +10]</Start>

TextEng: "Since I'm trying to save you all, couldn't you give me a deal?"
Text: "우리 모두를 구하려는 건데, 좀 깎아줄 수 없어?"
